title: Improvisation Workshop
description: For practitioners of acting improvisation, this course deepens participants' knowledge and skills through practical and theoretical readings, by viewing performances, and by improvising in class and in small groups outside class. Participants perform in a final public showing.
class_notes: From the Instructor: No prior experience with improv required. This class and all acting improvisation classes at UCSC are only offered in the Summer Session. Students can take both 41I and 141W for in-depth experience and skill building (but 41I is not required for enrollment in this class.)
